description: This file defines a React functional component named CourseCard, which renders a visual summary card for a course, including thumbnail, title, description, instructor, progress bar, and a CTA button. It utilizes external components and libraries such as 'react', 'react-router-dom', and a local ProgressBar component.

methods.name: CourseCard({ course, ctaLabel = "Open Course" })
methods.description: React component that displays a course summary card with course details, thumbnail, progress bar, and CTA button.

ctags.name: CourseCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function CourseCard({ course, ctaLabel = "Open Course" }) {$/
